meanings.definition: Incorrect or improper use of something
meanings.sent1: The misutilizations of the tools led to many accidents.
meanings.sent2: The company's misutilizations of funds resulted in financial losses.
meanings.sent3: The misutilizations of the office stapler for art projects amused the coworkers.
meanings.sent4: Her misutilizations of time were like trying to fit a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent5: The misutilizations of the fire extinguisher made the safety inspector cringe.

meanings.definition: The act of using something in a wrong or inappropriate way
meanings.sent1: His misutilizations of the company car were against the rules.
meanings.sent2: The misutilizations of the software caused system crashes.
meanings.sent3: The misutilizations of the umbrella as a parachute made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Their misutilizations of language turned conversations into a confusing mess.
meanings.sent5: The misutilizations of the microwave turned it into a science experiment gone wrong.
